allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove AI-generated prose patterns from story files

Replaced banned AI patterns across 20 story files in English and Spanish:
- Removed physical tells \(jaw clenched, heart pounded/sank\)
- Removed vague interiority \(coiled in gut, tension built\)
- Removed staccato ominous endings \(Patient. Hungry. Waiting.\)
- Cleaned up bold formatting on emotional descriptions

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refine Blueprint_Part2_v2: Address audit issues and reduce over-specification

- Remove verbose PROSE EXAMPLE blocks, replace with concise PROSE GUIDANCE
- Add Voice false normalization beat requirement \(D13-D16 range\)
- Add Szoravel factual limitation to prevent covert omniscience
- Add Dulint emotional delay requirement \(human first, not pure chess\)
- Add APPENDIX J: Localization governance rules \(EN/ES parity\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(" from content headers
- Classification now in frontmatter only, not in web excerpts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
